about.name: JM Hore
about.title: Front-End Web Developer and Designer
about.description: I'm a junior front-end web developer with a passion for turning creative ideas into engaging websites. During my free time, I immense myself in strategy and competitive games. I believe that coding provides endless innovations.

works.name: Portfolio
works.overview: Portfolio built primarly using React JS and Javascript Libraries. It features my works and techs I'm experienced in.

features.name: JSON File
features.about: Custom JSON file storing all the relevent data for my portfolio.
features.reflection: I created a custom JSON file to store all of the data that I put out in my portfolio. This made my data easily accesible and I can output it however I want

features.name: Animate.css
features.about: A React library of css animation by Daniel Eden.
features.reflection: This library is really useful because I was able to input quick and easy animations

features.name: Vanta.js
features.about: Javascript library of animated and interactable background by strinkingly.com
features.reflection: This library made is easier to add interactivity and appealing background to my website.

works.name: Movie Database
works.overview: A movie database built using React JS.

features.name: Web API
features.about: Web API to grab movies to be outputed and featured on a dynamic website.
features.reflection: Using TMDB API I made my own movie database showing all sorts of movies from trending to top-rated.

works.name: Capstone Project
works.overview: Woocommerce website about a fictional company called, Pacific Peak Adventures, selling tour packages available in British Columbia, Canada.

features.name: WooCommerce
features.about: WooCommerce plugin for wordpress to display products, in this case tour packages.
features.reflection: The plugin makes it easy to put custom and default content for each product to give it a default look whilest others have custom parts.
